original_title: 440 prisoners to receive Special Presidential Pardon for Poson
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A total of 440 Sri Lankan prisoners will be given a Special Presidential Pardon on Poson Poya Day, which falls on Saturday, 3rd June.
Sri Lanka's Department of Prisons said that 434 male prisoners and 6 female prisoners selected from prisons across the country will be pardoned on Poson Poya Day.
